::Grimlock/Lord Elder::

The two heroic Cybertronians continued to fire on the Minions in their desperate fight to save the Ark.

::Scorponok-Zarak::

The disentergrater beams rip into Scorponok's armor.

Zarak: Damn you fools!

Zarak ejects from the cockpit changing to head mode. He lands in place on the now robot mode Scorponok.

Scorponok's machine gun batteries continue to rip out at the enemy as the massive form steps forward trying to catch Sweeps within his pincers.

::Lord Jhiaxus::

Jhiaxus pulls up high and tries to drop more cluster bombs.

Jhiaxus: So many of them! How do we dog such an enemy?!

::Dark Rodimus::

Rodimus chuckles at the incoming missiles. He uses his back thrusters and with a running leap comes off the ground as the missile streak past and strike the ground below. His thrusters are not very powerful and do not take him to his enemy. He lands back on the ground. He fires off two more rockets. One ment to detonate in from of Cyclonus to blind his optics and the second to hit the target.


--- On Mon, 7/14/08, supercyclonus <supercyclonus@...> wrote:

> From: supercyclonus <supercyclonus@...>
> Subject: Re: The War of the ARK!
> To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com
> Date: Monday, July 14, 2008, 5:20 PM
> >"I dont fool I remember that I'm 
> > once MEgatron too, if the matrix
> > is weped out WE also are wiped...
> > what is the warantee that that won't
> > happen?"said Hydras by privated link
> 
> Cyclonus paused thoughtfully, as if for a moment in a burst
> of 
> clarity, he realized that his own future depended on the
> same matrix 
> he was so intent on gaining, but then his loyalty to
> Unicron snapped 
> fully and forcefully into place.
> 
> "I have never said you were fooled easily Hydras, I
> call you not with 
> lies but with truth." 
> 
> Cyclonus' voice was was both commanding and pleading as
> he 
> spoke, "Hydras, part of you was once a servant of
> Unicron, you can be 
> that again. You could obtain power that spans the universe,
> a name 
> for yourself greater than any Cybrtronian Autobot or
> Decepticon! The 
> future is yours to make, here and now! Join us!"
> 
> Around him sweeps manuvered, their movements agitated and
> aggressive 
> as if they too knew of the tense offer delivered to the
> Predicon 
> commander.
> 
> Decibel floated nearby Cyclonus uncharacteristically
> silent, only a 
> low chuckle coming from her vocators.
> 
> 
> 
> Grimlock, Lord Elder, and Legacy fired at the incoming
> sweeps, their 
> firepower combined with that of the shuttle and Ark is
> great indeed! 
> Explosions dotted the skies as many sweeps attempted to
> dodge the 
> fire and are unsuccessful.
> 
> However the sweeps were becoming more cagey as the fight
> continued, 
> as if they were learning from the deaths of the previous
> ones, 
> becoming more skilled, even seeming to anticipate attacks! 
> 
> Even Scorponok and Zarak are feeling these repercussions.
> Their 
> attack from the rear bit a large sized hole in the minion
> formation 
> as the fusion cannon, rockets and machine guns rip into the
> mass. Yet 
> for the G2 Decepticons it was like shaking a bee-hive. At
> the first 
> they had not been attacked as the Sweeps had been ignoring 
> Decepticons and Predicons, but that changed with this
> attack! As more 
> sweeps maneuvered through the air to fill in the hole
> opened by 
> Scorponok and Zarak, disintegration cannons opened fire on
> them, the 
> air filling with a slight burning smell!
> 
> 
>  
> Jhiaxus and Myrmidon headed into the mass of the sweeps,
> and the 
> sweeps enfolded them, twisting and turning. The jets were
> more agile 
> then the sweeps, but the sweeps seemed to be well armored,
> and 
> possesed a rather large numerical advantage. 
> 
> Shots are fired on both sides, Jhiaxus and Myrmidon both
> taking down 
> several sweeps at a time, but these seem to be replaced by
> a 
> seemingly endless number of them. 
>  
> 
> 
> As Dark Rodimus arrived it was becoming obvious to the
> casual 
> observer that even though many of the sweeps had been
> destroyed, 
> there were still many of them in the skies. The smell of
> burnt metal 
> and alloy was begining to fill the air, as smoke covered
> the ground 
> obscuring vision of many. 
> 
> However even through all that the aerial form of Cyclonus
> stood out, 
> resplendent and majestic, like an emperor looking over the
> land he 
> will soon conquer! 
> 
> As Dark Rodimus' firepower reaches into the skies,
> Cyclonus turned 
> toward it as if at the last moment detecting it, but it is
> too late! 
> Power ripped through his systems as circuits are
> temporarily 
> overloaded and his once pristine armor is singed, scorched
> and 
> pitted! 
> 
> Inwardly Cyclonus smiled as he knew who it was that did
> this: Rodimus 
> had arrived!
> 
> Flipping through the skies by the power of the blast it
> took a moment 
> for Cyclonus to regain his bearing in the air. As he
> leveled out, 
> already sweeps were rallying to his aid, bringing their
> cannons to 
> bear on Rodimus and opening up on him!
> 
> "NO!" Cyclonus called to them, his voice
> radiating power and 
> authority.  "He is mine!"  he commanded as he
> launched twin 
> incendiary missiles at Rodimus, ones that glowed like
> miniature twin 
> suns, as they seemed to almost glide foward toward Rodimus!
> 
> 
> 
> "It is time!" barked Scourge across the minion
> communication network, 
> even as he watched his commander and friend get pulled into
> the fray. 
> His gruff voice crackled in the ears of Nightstrike,
> Darkfate and 
> Tummult. 
> 
> With a single command sweeps pulled out and away, launching
> from the 
> center of the group. They did not target Rodimus or the
> Decepticons! 
> Instead nearly a third of the remaining sweep moved at
> their primary 
> target, led by Scourge, and Tummult (and Darkfate and
> Nightstrike??), 
> with cannons blazing they pushed towards the ARK!
> 
> Preston
> (Da'minion)
